DIY Spy Camera: A small camera can be attached to a tiny drone or a toy car, transforming it into a stealthy surveillance device.

Art Installation: A camera can be used as a creative piece of art, capturing the world in a unique perspective. Artists can experiment with different angles and compositions to create a visually striking installation.
Photo Frame: A camera can be repurposed as a photo frame, allowing photographers to display their work in an unconventional way.

Educational Tool: A camera can be used to teach children about photography and the mechanics of capturing images. It can be a hands-on learning experience, especially when paired with a camera manual or guidebook.
Game Controller: A camera can be used as a unique game controller, allowing players to interact with games in a new and immersive way.
